alert.note: Alert for Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 08 at 2:39AM CDT until June 08 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Flood Advisory for... Northwestern Beaver County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Northern Texas County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... * Until 545 AM CDT. * At 239 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. One to two inches of rain have already fallen. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hooker, Tyrone, Turpin, Floris, Hough and Baker.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Excessive runoff from heavy rainfall will cause flooding of small creeks and streams, country roads, farmland, and other low lying spots.
